874920.name: Fantasy Grounds - Devin Night 104: Heroic Characters 19 (Token Pack)
874920.description:
Devin Night 104: Heroic Characters 19

This pack contains demi-humans.
This product contains:
  • 2 Female Bugbear Rangers
  • Female Drow Fighter
  • Female Drow Hunter
  • Female Elf Sorceress
  • Female Elf Warrior
  • 2 Female Feline Tricksters
  • Female Granny Dwarf
  • Female Halfling Ranger
  • Female Snow Leopard
  • Male Demonkin Dark Knight
  • Male Demonkin Rogue
  • Male Demonkin Slasher
  • Male Drow Intimidator
  • Male Elemental Warlock
  • Male Elf Alchemist
  • Male Elf Archer
  • 2 Male Elf Boys
  • Male Elf King
  • 2 Male Elf Knights
  • Male Elf Nomad
  • Male Elf Mage
  • Male Elf Foxy Bard
  • 3 Male Half-Giant Barbarians
  • Male Half-Giant Red Death Knight
  • Male Merman Fighter
  • Male Troll Fighter
Converted by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
